Posts.Content: sweetaerobabe wrote: It looks like I am probably gonna be having a bilateral mastomecty with SNB within the next couple of weeks, I would like some input about the drains. Honestly, I think that is scaring me the most. I read comments about "stripping the drains"? But I have no idea what that means. How much is involved in taking care of these drains? I will be meeting with a PS, but needing chemo and radiation, Im not sure yet what will be done, if anything at the time of surgery. I would greatly appreciate and tips, tricks and advice you lovely ladys can offer me. Â Thanks so much Kristy Dx 8/17/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Question about drains sweetaerobabe jan508
